dict.acceptation: 预言，预示：预言某事，预言；

sent.orig: While some predict schism, others predict a good old fashioned compromise.
sent.trans: 在有些人预测分裂的同时，另一些人预测了有益的老式妥协。

sent.orig: Industry analysts say it is hard to predict how all this will turn out.
sent.trans: 产业分析人士称难以预测结果。

sent.orig: Most predict that the Abstract will save Hip-Hop but let the music speak for itself.
sent.trans: 大多数预测认为。将抽象节省街舞。但让音乐本身说话。

sent.orig: Some economists predict it could add asas. 5 percentage points to the annual growth rate.
sent.trans: 有经济学家预计他们将为台湾的年增长率增加多达。5个百分点。

sent.orig: The technical interest is served as empiricalanalytic knowledge is used to predict patterns of events.
sent.trans: 技术的兴趣充当了实验的知识，被用于预测事件的类型。这样的可预测性可以进行控制的测量。
